page.title: 09My Saturday Diary
page.content: On a Saturday morning I get up at 9.00a.m..I get ready and have my breakfast.I have to get my dancing clothes ready.At 10.20 a.m.I catch a bus which goes down Westgate Road. I go down Waterloo St. and Peel St.to Peel Lane. I am going to" Dance City".Itwas opened by Lynn Seymour on 13.5.85. Lynn Seymour is a famous ballet dancer. Dance City opens at 11.00 a.m. on a Saturday morning. Children from 6 to 15 years old go to the jazz class. I go there on a Saturday morning. We practise dances and jumps and leaps. Every week we learn something new. We wear leotard and tights or shorts. The dancing finishes at 12.45 p.m. We have a break at 12.00 p.m. for 10 minutes. We have a lot to do. After Dance City I go home.
